tests.name: URL without a path
tests.run: ./client http://www.w3.org experiment; wget http://www.w3.org -O control; diff experiment control

tests.name: URL with a path
tests.run: ./client http://www.w3.org/Protocols/HTTP/1.0/spec.html experiment; wget http://www.w3.org/Protocols/HTTP/1.0/spec.html -O control; diff experiment control

tests.name: URL with 302
tests.run: ./client http://w3.org experiment; wget http://w3.org -O control; diff experiment control

tests.name: URL with chunked transfer
tests.run: ./client https://jigsaw.w3.org/HTTP/ChunkedScript experiment; wget https://jigsaw.w3.org/HTTP/ChunkedScript -O control; diff experiment control
